meanings.definition: A secondary menu within a main menu.
meanings.sent1: The submenus in the game allow players to access different levels.
meanings.sent2: When I clicked on the 'File' menu, a list of submenus popped up.
meanings.sent3: The submenus at the restaurant were like hidden treasure chests waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a labyrinth of submenus, each leading to a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The submenus on the website were color-coded for easy navigation.

meanings.definition: A list of options that appears when a user selects an item in a menu.
meanings.sent1: The submenus on the screen displayed various editing tools.
meanings.sent2: After clicking on 'Edit', a dropdown menu with submenus appeared.
meanings.sent3: The submenus seemed to dance on the screen, tempting the user to click.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like submenus, revealing more choices as he delved deeper.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the submenus was like exploring a digital maze.
